name: Solar Terminator
description:
This is our team's game finished in 48 hours for Global Game Jam - 2022. 

The player plays the role of AI and talks to the two protagonists respectively.

The spaceship crashes on a planet where time passes quickly. Any choice of the player may accelerate the aging of the protagonist and consume their lives.

The Player needs to guide the two protagonists to meet before their lives end, or end the game with a bad ending.
